compatibility.notes: The CECILL-1.0 license allows for weak copyleft, meaning that it can be combined with other licenses, but care must be taken to ensure compliance with the terms of the licenses involved.

key_requirements: Maintain the integrity of the license when redistributing.
Ensure that the software is used in a secure manner.
Acknowledge the limited warranty and liability.
license.name: CECILL-1.0
obligations: Users must disclose the source code when redistributing modified versions.
Users must include the original license text in redistributions.
Users must include copyright notices in redistributions.
Users must state changes made to the original software.
